title: Who Is Russell Westbrook’s Wife? Nina’s Job & Kids
description: Russell Westbrook is a celebrated American professional basketball player known for his explosive athleticism and triple-double prowess in the NBA. A nine-time NBA All-Star and the 2017 NBA Most Valuable Player (MVP), he has cemented his legacy as one of the most dynamic point guards in the league’s history. Alongside his impressive career on the […] The post Who Is Russell Westbrook’s Wife? Nina’s Job & Kids appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Curious about Russell Westbrook's wife? Here's everything about the NBA star's spouse, including her work and the couple's kids.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Russell Westbrook is a celebrated American professional basketball player known for his explosive athleticism and triple-double prowess in the NBA. A nine-time NBA All-Star and the 2017 NBA Most Valuable Player (MVP), he has cemented his legacy as one of the most dynamic point guards in the league’s history. Alongside his impressive career on the court, fans are eager to learn about Russell Westbrook’s personal life, especially when it comes to his wife and family. So, here’s all you need to know about Westbrook’s spouse, her profession, and their kids. Who is Russell Westbrook married to? Russell Westbrook is married to Nina Earl Westbrook. In an interview with Access Hollywood, Nina shared that they first met each other while studying at UCLA. Following a delightful six-year relationship, Russell finally proposed to Nina in 2014. The couple tied the knot and celebrated their union with a stunning outdoor ceremony in Los Angeles on August 29, 2015, in the presence of numerous celebrity friends. In a heartfelt interview with People in November 2022, Russell expressed his appreciation for his family and shared touching words about Nina. He shared, “She’s been holding s— down from start to finish, and now been able to see her grow into the things that she’s been wanting to do while still supporting me and doing stuff with the kids, and doing this and doing that. I’m just grateful to have a partner able to do all that sacrifice. Now we’re here.” What is Nina Westbrook’s job? Nina Westbrook is an entrepreneur and a licensed marriage and family therapist. According to her LinkedIn profile, Nina obtained her bachelor’s degree in psychology from UCLA and a master’s degree in clinical psychology from The Chicago School. She subsequently became a licensed marriage and family therapist. Nina is also an advocate for mental health and women’s issues, with a particular focus on the challenges faced by women of color. Since then, Nina has thrived as an entrepreneur, opening a boutique called The Little Ark and launching a children’s clothing line, Minibrook, in 2020. Additionally, she is the CEO of Bene, a platform for mental health workshops and self-care advice for women. Together with her husband, Nina also formed Why Not? Foundation, which empowers underprivileged children and communities. Furthermore, she hosts the Do Tell Relationship Podcast and is a member of the board of advisors for Resnick Neuropsychiatric Hospital, UCLA. How many kids do Russell and Nina Westbrook have? Russell and Nina Westbrook have three children. The couple celebrated the arrival of their first child, a son named Noah, on May 16, 2017. Just 16 months later, they shared the exciting news that they were expecting again on YouTube. This time, the announcement was for their twin daughters, Skye and Jordyn, who were born in November 2018.
html:
Russell Westbrook is a celebrated American professional basketball player known for his explosive athleticism and triple-double prowess in the NBA. A nine-time NBA All-Star and the 2017 NBA Most Valuable Player (MVP), he has cemented his legacy as one of the most dynamic point guards in the league’s history. Alongside his impressive career on the court, fans are eager to learn about Russell Westbrook’s personal life, especially when it comes to his wife and family.

So, here’s all you need to know about Westbrook’s spouse, her profession, and their kids.

Who is Russell Westbrook married to?

Russell Westbrook is married to Nina Earl Westbrook.

In an interview with Access Hollywood, Nina shared that they first met each other while studying at UCLA. Following a delightful six-year relationship, Russell finally proposed to Nina in 2014. The couple tied the knot and celebrated their union with a stunning outdoor ceremony in Los Angeles on August 29, 2015, in the presence of numerous celebrity friends.

In a heartfelt interview with People in November 2022, Russell expressed his appreciation for his family and shared touching words about Nina. He shared, “She’s been holding s— down from start to finish, and now been able to see her grow into the things that she’s been wanting to do while still supporting me and doing stuff with the kids, and doing this and doing that. I’m just grateful to have a partner able to do all that sacrifice. Now we’re here.”

What is Nina Westbrook’s job?

Nina Westbrook is an entrepreneur and a licensed marriage and family therapist.

According to her LinkedIn profile, Nina obtained her bachelor’s degree in psychology from UCLA and a master’s degree in clinical psychology from The Chicago School. She subsequently became a licensed marriage and family therapist. Nina is also an advocate for mental health and women’s issues, with a particular focus on the challenges faced by women of color.

Since then, Nina has thrived as an entrepreneur, opening a boutique called The Little Ark and launching a children’s clothing line, Minibrook, in 2020. Additionally, she is the CEO of Bene, a platform for mental health workshops and self-care advice for women.

Together with her husband, Nina also formed Why Not? Foundation, which empowers underprivileged children and communities. Furthermore, she hosts the Do Tell Relationship Podcast and is a member of the board of advisors for Resnick Neuropsychiatric Hospital, UCLA.

How many kids do Russell and Nina Westbrook have?

Russell and Nina Westbrook have three children.

The couple celebrated the arrival of their first child, a son named Noah, on May 16, 2017. Just 16 months later, they shared the exciting news that they were expecting again on YouTube. This time, the announcement was for their twin daughters, Skye and Jordyn, who were born in November 2018.
